item.description:
Friday night out for dinner and comedy in Manchester! After a long week at work there is nothing better than having dinner, a couple drinks, and laughing at a guy telling funny stories on stage :-)

If you agree, join us for the next meetup. We'll have drinks and appetizers at 6:30pm at Smokey Bones Barbeque & Grill. If you arrive a little late, ask for a table reserved under "Cammy".

After apps we will make our way to the Funny Bone Comedy club where Pete Correale will put on a show at 7:30.

Get your tickets early! E-mail me with questions, comments, or just to chat.

Smokey Bones Barbeque & Grill
350 Buckland Hills Dr # Trlr
Manchester, CT 06042-8700
(860) 648-1737

Funny Bone Comedy Club
www.hartfordfunnybone.com
194 Buckland Hills Dr
Manchester, CT 06042-8705
(860) 432-8600

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: A Night of Eating and Laughing!
